content: Hi folks. Several users -- all outside of the US -- are trying to browse the site https://ecr.aimsplatform.org and are seeing an error loading the site. Is this blocked for some reason?
Hi @Richard Stanley - I am aware that the website is only accessible stateside. Let me see what else I can find out.
Thanks @Natalie V. Collins The folks are interested in use cases, architecture, docs, they are not trying to access any backend systems under that domain.
Richard - please anticipate an email from me (quo0@cdc.gov) shortly so I can get some additional information from you. Thanks!
